name: ZombAI (hecto600, Klaatu92)
description:
Created by hecto600 and Klatuu92(https://klaatu92.itch.io/ )

Instructions:

  • Movements: W,A,S,D

   • Interaction: E

   • Attack1: LMB

   • Attack2: RMB

   • Kick: Spacebar 

Feel free to give us constructive feedback. This is our first game jam participation. 

Made for Wowie Jam 4.0.

Credits:
